item.title: Uninterruptible 5v USB Power Supply
item.description: There’s a wide range of USB powered devices around an average tech enthusiast: phones, tablets, Raspberry Pies, flashlights and electronic cigarettes. My hand-held electric screwdriver can be charged from USB nowadays.

item.title: About me
item.description: I am starting this simple blog to describe some of my cheap’n’dirty hacks and diy projects that I find useful enough and worth sharing. When describing projects as “cheap”, I consider that you have fun building it and your time commitment is out of the equation :) You might find the affiliate links to the products that I have used personally and/or recommend to be used for one or another DIY project.
